name: Epihyperderpflardioid "Intention"
description: "Epihyperderpflardioid" is the name I gave to a large family of symmetrical loopy shapes, based on sine waves and rotations. I studied them extensively, but don't claim to understand them fully, yet. I use them often, rendered in a variety of ways. With 15 randomly chosen parameters, the random seed for this one is "Intention", chosen with intention. Rendered as SVG, displays crisp at any resolution. By Piter Pasma (https://piterpasma.nl and @piterpasma on Instagram).
